import { Meta, Story, Canvas, ArgsTable } from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';
import Box from '../../components/Box';
import Text from '../../components/Text';
import { themeColors } from '../../theme';

<Meta title="Theme/Colors" />

# Theme Colors

Theme colors can be passed to any components through its relevant props as it could be `bg` `color` etc...

<Canvas>
  <Story name="colors">
    {Object.keys(themeColors).map((color) => {
      if (typeof themeColors[color] === 'string') return null;
      return (
        <Box key={color} flexWrap="wrap">
          {themeColors[color].map((hex, i) => (
            <Box key={hex} flexDirection="column">
              <Box bg={hex} size={80} />
              <Text variant="p.xs" fontWeight="bold">{`${color}.${i}`}</Text>
              <Text variant="p.xs">{hex}</Text>
            </Box>
          ))}
        </Box>
      );
    })}
  </Story>
  <Story name="not-colors">
    <Box>
      <Box flexDirection="column">
        <Box bg="black" size={80} />
        <Text variant="p.xs">black</Text>
      </Box>
      <Box flexDirection="column">
        <Box bg="white" size={80} />
        <Text variant="p.xs">white</Text>
      </Box>
    </Box>
  </Story>
</Canvas>

<ArgsTable of={Box} />
